title: Understanding the Galvanic Cell
text: In a galvanic cell, the anode is where oxidation occurs, and the cathode is where reduction occurs. Which electrode is losing mass?

title: Oxidation and Reduction
text: Oxidation involves the loss of electrons, and reduction involves the gain of electrons. Which process is happening at the electrode that is losing mass?

title: Identifying the Anode
text: Since the Zn electrode is losing mass, it is undergoing oxidation. Therefore, which electrode is the anode?
